items.sentence: How old were you when you stopped believing in Santa Claus?
I can\'t believe you\'re going to give away all your money.
I won\'t go with you unless you tell me where we\'re going.
I hope Tom stays in Boston for at least another three days.
I hope you and Tom will come over for dinner sometime soon.
I just told Tom that I wanted him to help clean the garage.
I just told Tom that I wanted to help him clean the garage.
I was the only one who didn\'t know Tom had been in prison.
I\'m really looking forward to going to the beach with Tom.
Tom is the kind of person who would do something like that.
